LanguageData.StoryNotFound: Story was not found in the storybook.\nThe creator may have removed the story.\nIf you reloaded this game the last received story will continue playing.
LanguageData.InitialIntroduction:
Here you can find & play stories that are published by others.
Once your in a story you can rate it. The best stories are shown at the top.

Want to make your own story? Its easy, just go to `https://storyteller.keyboxsoftware.nl`.

Have fun!
Niek
LanguageData.LoadingStoryFailed:
This Book was lost..

It seems that the story can not be found.
The creator may have removed the story or something went wrong while pre-reading the story.
Please notify the mod dev if there is a error.
LanguageData.ParametersOverriden: There are (some) settings that are defined by the story and can not be changed.
LanguageData.LocationOverriden: Landing site is defined by the story and can not be changed
LanguageData.SyncRate: Story sync rate with server (Please use Short only when needed\ne.g. when the story is created by a friend while you play)
LanguageData.ZoneCopyIntro:
Here you can copy your home area and integrate it in your story.
Two options:
 - Select 'Copy structure' to spawn the same structure, floors & items
 in your story using the 'Create structure' event.
 - Select 'Copy location' to use the area in 'location' fields in checks & events.
LanguageData.ZoneCopyIntroShort: Here you can copy your home area and integrate it in your story.
LanguageData.ZoneCopyOrigin: The origin is the zero point of the area and can be used to place the area relative to e.g. a pawn
LanguageData.PawnsZoneCopy: Copy pawns (Only kind, name, faction, weapons & gear)
LanguageData.WarnZoneCopy: For performance (and my poor server) please only select the required categories
LanguageData.ShouldHaveCustomMail: This event should be customized in the mail tab of the event.
LanguageData.PlantSproutMessage: A grove of {PLANT}'s has sprouted nearby! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest them later.
LanguageData.AlertNeedStoryDesc:
This won't do, this won't do at all!

Where is our story gone?
O, would you human kindly check your connection to the outside world?

(Big stories my take a little while to load, but not more than 2 minutes)
LanguageData.EnableCreatorToolsToolTip: Enable storymaker debug connection, shows tile numbers, cell numbers, lets you copy zones and locations, and more!
